Pre-Game Insights: Misbah-ul-Haq has slammed Pakistan's fitness standards ahead of their T20 World Cup game vs India
Pakistan has been criticized for their team selection and approach to the modern T20 game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan lost their first warm-up game against England
Pakistan's fitness issues were evident in the Asia Cup, where they suffered from cramps throughout the tournament
Others: Pakistan will begin their T20 World Cup campaign against India on 23 October, 2022
Pakistan reached the semi-finals of the World Cup in the last edition where they were defeated by eventual champions Australia
